title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 73 - Public Access To Industrial Board Of Appeals Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 73 - Public Access To Industrial Board Of Appeals Records

State Regulations
§ 73.0 - Repealed
§ 73.1 - Application
§ 73.2 - Location and hours for public access; designation of records access and fiscal officers
§ 73.3 - Requests for records
§ 73.4 - Responses to requests
§ 73.5 - Fees
§ 73.6 - Industrial board of appeals subject matter list
§ 73.7 - Denial of access to records
§ 73.8 - Posted notice
§ 73.9 - Severability

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 73

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, art. 6; Labor

Law, §§ 100[5], 101

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
